abstract.para: wdb2ts is a apache module to fetch data for a geographic location from a wdb database. The request is based on REST. Depending on the request the data is returned as a comma separated list of values (CSV) or an xml formatted timeserie.

chapter.title: Wdb2ts Apache module
chapter.para: This document contains information of wdb2ts Apache module and the different content handlers that is implemented.

chapter.title: Content handlers
chapter.para: The documentation of the content handlers that currently is implemented.
